title: cmd/gc: assigned but not used checking is not strict enough
body:
The following program, http://play.golang.org/p/92JZyQQ-Gr, fails because an `err` value is shadowed.

This error cropped up a few times in the standard library (and more times in user code). 

@robpike thinks the compiler should catch this.

Discussion: https://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/golang-nuts/MdDLbvOjb4o
